title: Carnation Chocolate Fudge Cake
ingredients: ['175g (6 oz) self-raising flour', '2½ tablespoons cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '150g (5 oz) caster sugar', '2 eggs', '150ml (¼ pt) corn oil', '150ml (¼ pt) milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '125g (5 oz) dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids)', '397g can Carnation Caramel', '1 tablespoon icing sugar']
